Feb 22 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O:

  • AMAZON SUES ‘FAKE REVIEW BROKERS’ WHO ATTEMPT TO PROFIT FROM GENERATING MISLEADING AND FRAUDULENT REVIEWS

  • AMAZON SAYS LAWSUITS AIM TO SHUT DOWN TWO MAJOR FAKE REVIEW BROKERS, APPSALLY AND REBATEST


Further company coverage: AMZN.O
